content: **manos del uruguay x lys day 2019** fairmount fibers is excited to release 6 new patterns exclusively for lys day april 27 2019 celebrate lys day 2019 by visiting your local manos stockist 1 for this and our other patterns fun crocheted colorplay in 2 fino mini-skein kits 2 shown here in #16 sybil + #6 flora ////////////////////////////////////// *size* 13 wide x 54 long *materials* manos del uruguay fino 70% extrafine merino 30% silk approx 100g/490 yds 2 mini-skein kits shown in kit #16 sybil 444 topsy-turvy a 430 gilt b 443 turkish delight c 431 chemise d 425 fascinator e and kit #6 flora 423 tincture f 407 velvet pincushion g 408 crystal goblet h 404 watered silk i 433 folly j us e crochet hook 3 5mm or size to obtain gauge tapestry needle *gauge* 18 sts and 19 row = 4 in stitch pattern 1 https //fairmountfibers com/pages/locations 2 https //fairmountfibers com/collections/kits/products/fino-mini-skeins
